recipe.title: Soy-Pickled Jalapeños
ingredients: 3 large fresh jalapeños (4 inches), sliced 1/8 inch thick
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a small heavy saucepan and bring to a boil. Remove from heat and cool to room temperature, stirring occasionally. Marinate, chilled, at least 8 hours.
